price: 37.Qaran qanxixaah qisih admisen qasa faleh (adintá) inna le qoborta yakke waqdi, (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk).
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ وَرۡدَةٗ كَٱلدِّهَانِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā inshaqqati al-samāu fakānat wardatan kal-dihāni
